posts.post_content:
Hello
still trying to sink my teeth in on this set.
Im looking for HOFers graded 2-3 (i.e mordecai brown, joss, baker, walsh) not currently worrying about cobb or young or the higher end guys.

also if anyone has a bunch of graded commons let me know, im doing ok sniping but anytime i can knock down 5 or 6 at a clip its nice.

thanks alot everything
PM me or email me if anything [url]BigDan502@yahoo.com[/url]

Hi Dan:

I have the following available that are a match to what you are looking for:

T206 M. Brown (HOF), Sweet Caporal, chicago shirt, PSA 3, $130
T206 G. Davis (HOF), Piedmont, PSA 3+, $100
T206 V. Willis (HOF), Sweet Caporal, PSA 3, $100
T206 C. Griffith (HOF), batting, Sweet Caporal, PSA 2, $60 

Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like any.

Good luck putting your collection together!

Regards,
Adam
